content: a free version of this pattern with ads can be found ** in my website here 1 ** this listing is for a pdf file that consists of a total of 7 pages including cover images copyright and information about the designer there is step by step detailed instructions with pictures to make the cute amigurumi crochet strawberry pattern pictured in this listing this is a pdf file for an adorable 3d crochet strawberry pattern it was written using standard us terminology **approximate size of the finished crochet strawberry ** the strawberries pictured are from the same pattern but with different yarns small strawberry approx 2 5 cm tall and 4 75 12 cm in diameter medium strawberry approx 3 7 5 cm and 6 25 17 cm in diameter large strawberry approx 4 10 cm tall and 9 24 cm in diameter **yarn used in the pictured strawberries ** you will need only 12 to 15 yds 11 to 14 m of light #3 medium #4 or bulky #6 for each fruit **materials and tools ** 2 75 mm us c crochet hook if you re using light #3 yarn 3 50 mm us e crochet hook for the medium weight or bulky/super bulky chenille yarn tapestry needle to weave-in the ends white embroidery floss for the seeds a small amount of stuffing fiber stuffing tool optional a pair of 8 mm safety eyes if you re making the larger fruit optional safety eyes placement tool optional embroidery needle to embroider the seeds scraps of pink yarn for the mouth optional scissors stitch marker **gauge ** gauge is not important for this project please refer to the finished project size for reference **language ** english us **level of difficulty ** easy but not for beginners basic skills needed amigurumi technique magic_ring chain single_crochet increase single_crochet invisible decrease single_crochet in continuous rounds
